original_title: Man stabs 19 year old girl over dispute with her father
original_body_lines: A nineteen-year-old girl who was returning home from work was stabbed with a knife by a 40-year-old man in Piliyandala.
Police said the victim had been admitted to the Homagama hospital and then transferred to the National Hospital in Colombo.
It was revealed that the suspect had stabbed the girl over a dispute with her father.
The suspect who is addicted to alcohol has been arrested by the Piliyandala Police over the incident.
